---
title: Case Study 1
subtitle: 'Applied Multiple Regression/Correlation Analysis for the Behavioral Sciences by Jacob Cohen, Patricia Cohen, Stephen G. West, Leona S. Aiken'
date: 'Feb 17, 2023'
author: Sungkyun Cho
execute:
  warning: false
  freeze: auto
format: 
   html:
    df-print: tibble
    #monofont: 'FiraCode-Regular'
---

::: {.cell}

:::



## Leerkes and Crockenberg (1999)의 육아에 대한 효능감 연구
*Source: Statistical Methods for Psychology (8e) by Dave C. Howell*

::: {layout-ncol=2}
- 5개월의 아기를 양육하는 92명의 어머니를 대상
- 본인이 아이였을 때 어머니에게 받은 양육(maternal care) 정도가 자신이 어머니가 되었을 때 아이를 향한 양육효능감으로 이전될 것이라는 가설
- 매개변수로 maternal care로부터 영향을 받은 자존감(self-esteem)을 고려.
- 데이터: [maternal_care.sav](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gwqqfkge8rqb2a9/MediationData.sav?dl=1)

![](images/mediation_maternal.png){width=450}
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(haven)
maternal <- read_spss("howell/maternal_care.sav")
maternal
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 92 × 4
   FAMID Esteem MatCare Efficacy
   <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl>    <dbl>
 1     1   3.83    2.58      3.7
 2     2   3.5     2.83      3.4
 3     4   4       3.17      3.8
 4     8   4       3.75      3.9
 5     9   4       3.58      3.9
 6    11   3.33    3.67      3.7
 7    12   3.5     3.25      3.8
 8    13   3.67    3.75      3.5
 9    15   1.83    3.17      3.1
10    16   2.83    2.67      3.5
# ℹ 82 more rows
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# correlations
# library(psych)
lowerCor(maternal[-1])  # lowerCor(maternal[2:4])과 동일 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
         Estem MatCr Effcc
Esteem   1.00             
MatCare  0.40  1.00       
Efficacy 0.38  0.27  1.00 
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
GGally::ggpairs(maternal[-1])
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](case1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mod1 <- lm(Efficacy ~ MatCare, data = maternal)
mod2 <- lm(Efficacy ~ MatCare + Esteem, data = maternal)
```
:::

::: {.cell layout-ncol="2"}

```{.r .cell-code}
# compare models
# library(jtools)
export_summs(mod1, mod2, error_format = "(p = {p.value})") |> print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                ───────────────────────────────────────────────
                                   Model 1         Model 2     
                              ─────────────────────────────────
                  (Intercept)        3.27 ***        2.94 ***  
                                (p = 0.00)      (p = 0.00)     
                  MatCare            0.11 *          0.06      
                                (p = 0.01)      (p = 0.20)     
                  Esteem                             0.15 **   
                                                (p = 0.00)     
                              ─────────────────────────────────
                  N                 92              92         
                  R2                 0.07            0.16      
                ───────────────────────────────────────────────
                  *** p < 0.001; ** p < 0.01; * p <            
                  0.05.                                        

Column names: names, Model 1, Model 2
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summ(mod2, part.corr = TRUE, model.info = FALSE, model.fit = FALSE) |> print()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Standard errors: OLS
--------------------------------------------------------------------
                    Est.   S.E.   t val.      p   partial.r   part.r
----------------- ------ ------ -------- ------ ----------- --------
(Intercept)         2.94   0.17    16.95   0.00                     
MatCare             0.06   0.04     1.30   0.20        0.14     0.13
Esteem              0.15   0.05     3.02   0.00        0.31     0.29
--------------------------------------------------------------------
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](case1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# test for mediation
summary(mediate(Efficacy ~ MatCare + (Esteem), data = maternal)) # library(psych)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](case1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Call: mediate(y = Efficacy ~ MatCare + (Esteem), data = maternal)

Direct effect estimates (traditional regression)    (c') X + M on Y 
          Efficacy   se     t df     Prob
Intercept     2.94 0.17 16.95 89 1.30e-29
MatCare       0.06 0.04  1.30 89 1.98e-01
Esteem        0.15 0.05  3.02 89 3.28e-03

R = 0.4 R2 = 0.16   F = 8.34 on 2 and 89 DF   p-value:  0.000479 

 Total effect estimates (c) (X on Y) 
          Efficacy   se     t df     Prob
Intercept     3.27 0.14 23.24 90 8.31e-40
MatCare       0.11 0.04  2.63 90 1.00e-02

 'a'  effect estimates (X on M) 
          Esteem   se    t df     Prob
Intercept   2.26 0.29 7.69 90 1.79e-11
MatCare     0.36 0.09 4.18 90 6.82e-05

 'b'  effect estimates (M on Y controlling for X) 
       Efficacy   se    t df    Prob
Esteem     0.15 0.05 3.02 89 0.00328

 'ab'  effect estimates (through all  mediators)
        Efficacy boot   sd lower upper
MatCare     0.05 0.05 0.02  0.02   0.1
```
:::
:::
